app.name: WiiMedic
app.long_description:
WiiMedic is a comprehensive diagnostic and health monitoring tool for the Nintendo Wii.
As Wii consoles age, hardware issues become more common. WiiMedic gives you a complete picture of your system's health in one place.
FEATURES: NEW IN v1.2.0: - System Checkup + Recommendations: Auto-detects issues and gives beginner-friendly advice with severity levels - NAND Backup Safety Check: Verifies BootMii, NAND backup, keys.bin, Priiloader with a Safety Score - Diagnostic History: Saves snapshots over time, tracks NAND degradation and IOS changes
DIAGNOSTIC MODULES: - System Information: Hardware revision, firmware, region, video mode, memory stats - NAND Health Check: Scan NAND for space usage, file counts, and health score - IOS Installation Scan: Audit all installed IOS versions, detect stubs and cIOS - Storage Speed Test: Benchmark SD/USB read and write speeds with ratings - Controller Diagnostics: Test GC controllers and Wii Remotes, detect stick drift - Network Test: Check WiFi, IP config, internet connectivity with latency - Full Report Generator: Save comprehensive diagnostic report to SD/USB
Perfect for: - Diagnosing hardware issues on aging Wiis - Verifying your softmod setup is correct - Testing second-hand Wii consoles before buying - Sharing system info when asking for help on forums - Checking storage device compatibility and speed
Navigation: Use D-Pad UP/DOWN to navigate, A to select, HOME to exit.
